meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shabby.
meanings.sent1: The shabbinesses of the old chair were evident in its torn fabric and wobbly legs.
meanings.sent2: The shabbinesses of the building were noticeable due to its peeling paint and cracked windows.
meanings.sent3: Despite the shabbinesses of the costume, the actor wore it proudly on stage.
meanings.sent4: The shabbinesses of the town reflected the neglect of its infrastructure and public spaces.
meanings.sent5: The shabbinesses of the room made it feel unwelcoming and uncared for.

meanings.definition: The condition of being worn or faded from use or wear.
meanings.sent1: She noticed the shabbinesses of her favorite sweater with its frayed edges and faded color.
meanings.sent2: The shabbinesses of the rug were evident in its threadbare patches and dull appearance.
meanings.sent3: The shabbinesses of the old book gave it a charming vintage look on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The shabbinesses of the car hinted at the many miles it had traveled on the open road.
meanings.sent5: The shabbinesses of the toy showed how much it had been loved and played with over the years.
